title: CS Lewis MIracles: 1a Do You Believe in Ghosts?
description:
People are not blank slates  just taking in what they experience. Beliefs are not quite so simple. CS Lewis begins his discussion of natural and supernatural by talking about the only person he knew that claimed to have seen a ghost not believing in afterlife existence.

CS Lewis Miracles https://www.amazon.com/Miracles-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BY77FY 

CS Lewis Miracles Audiobook https://www.audible.com/pd/Religion-Spirituality/Miracles-Audiobook/B002V8KS3S
